item.title: Advanced Micro Devices' 2026 Forecasts Are Way Too Low

item.title: Lockheed Martin: Is the Market Overlooking This Defensive Giant?
item.description: Lockheed Martin's vast order backlog and essential defense technology position it as a premier defensive industrial stock for long-term investors.
